_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: uBingo
author: hello@unately.com
description: A Bingo Modpack based on the Bongo mod with much features.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

LATEST_TAG=`curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/unately/ubingo/releases/latest" | grep '"tag_name":' | sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/'`

if [ "${MODPACK_VERSION}" == "latest" ] || [ "${MODPACK_VERSION}" == "" ] || [ "${MODPACK_VERSION}" == " " ] || [ -n "${MODPACK_VERSION}" ]; then
    cd /mnt/server
    wget https://github.com/Unately/uBingo/releases/download/${LATEST_TAG}/uBingo-Server-${LATEST_TAG}.zip
    unzip uBingo-Server-${LATEST_TAG}.zip
    rm uBingo-Server-${LATEST_TAG}.zip

    wget https://github.com/Unately/uBingo/raw/master/dockerfiles/server-install-script -O install.sh
    dos2unix install.sh
    bash install.sh
    rm install.sh
else
    cd /mnt/server
    wget https://github.com/Unately/uBingo/releases/download/v${MODPACK_VERSION}/uBingo-Server-v${MODPACK_VERSION}.zip
    unzip uBingo-Server-v${MODPACK_VERSION}.zip
    rm uBingo-Serverv-${MODPACK_VERSION}.zip

    wget https://github.com/Unately/uBingo/raw/master/dockerfiles/server-install-script -O install.sh
    dos2unix install.sh
    bash install.sh
    rm install.sh
fi

variables.name: Version
variables.description: The version of the uBingo modpack to install.
